commands.name: new-ghostty-window
commands.title: New Ghostty Window
commands.description: Launch a new window in Ghostty

commands.name: new-ghostty-tab
commands.title: New Ghostty Tab
commands.description: Launch a new tab in Ghostty

commands.name: search-ghostty-tab
commands.title: Search Ghostty Tabs
commands.subtitle: Ghostty
commands.description: List all tabs and go to the selected.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
